translation.en: [man sighs] Okay, here we go. I think it's all set.
translation.it: Ok, eccoci. Credo sia tutto pronto.

translation.en: -[man] Love it! -[woman] Want me to do it?
[woman] Teddy, you like your new fire truck?
translation.it: Ti piace il camion dei pompieri?

translation.en: Look at the camera. Look and say, "Hi, Mom."
Well, look at her and say it.
-Oh, be careful, honey. -[Dad] Get the camera.
Look at this, huh! It's your sister.
Katie Cat! That's good, dude. Gimme some.
translation.it: Katie Chella! Mi piace! Batti il cinque!

translation.en: Merry Christmas 2008! Santa got Teddy a bike!
translation.it: Buon Natale 2008! Teddy ha una nuova bicicletta!
Babbo Natale ha portato una bici!

translation.en: -All right, wave to Mom. Say "Hi, Mom." -Hi, Mom!
It's Christmas 2011! Whoo! What did we get?
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! What are you doing, you guys? Come on!
All right? What-- What do we do? We...
Okay, so most people don't know this, but reindeer love candy canes. Watch.
translation.it: Molti non lo sanno, ma le renne amano i bastoncini di zucchero. Guardate.

translation.en: -I want a reindeer! -[Mom] You want a reindeer?
[Dad] Oh, really? Where are we gonna keep this reindeer?
translation.it: - Sì? E dove la terrai? - Un pesce no?

translation.en: -How about a fish? You want a fish? -[Dad] No, let's go with the reindeer.
translation.it: - Sì? E dove la terrai? - Un pesce no? - Un pesce... - No, la renna è meglio.

translation.en: -[Mom] Look, look! She's eating it! -[Kate] So cool!
-Merry Christmas from the Pierce family! -[Dad] ♪ Merry Christmas! ♪
translation.it: Buon Natale dalla famiglia Pierce! Buon Natale!

translation.en: Teddy is about to open his present from Daddy.
translation.it: Teddy sta per aprire il regalo di papà!

translation.en: -Mommy doesn't really approve, okay. -This is a big one! [clears throat]
translation.it: - La mamma non approva, ok? - È quello grosso!

translation.en: -So cool. A knife. -[Mom chuckles] What's it say?
-"A Pierce always sees it through." -That's right.
-Everyone get together. -A picture. All right, guys.

translation.it: Felice pupazzo di neve! - Bene. - Ok.

translation.en: [sighs] Dear Santa, this is Kate Pierce.
translation.it: Caro Babbo Natale, mi chiamo Kate Pierce.

translation.en: Just wanted to say that I've been really good this year.
I know I haven't been doing too well in school,
translation.it: A scuola non sono andata benissimo,

translation.en: especially since I got a D minus in Spanish.
I have a really hard time with languages.
But I promise to get my grades up in the new year.
translation.it: Ma prometto di migliorare col nuovo anno.

translation.en: I help out Mom a lot. She has to work at the hospital most nights,
translation.it: Ho aiutato tanto la mamma! Lei fa le notti all'ospedale,

translation.en: so I start dinner three, four times a week,
translation.it: perciò a volte preparo la cena,

translation.en: do the dishes, and take out the trash.
translation.it: lavo i piatti e porto fuori la spazzatura.

translation.en: And I try not to get into too much trouble.
translation.it: E cerco di non cacciarmi nei guai.

translation.en: I do say bad words every now and then,
but that's only when my brother, Teddy, makes fun of me and I lose my sh--
translation.it: ma solo perché Teddy mi prende in giro e io mi inc...

translation.en: Anyway, Santa, I'm not asking for much this Christmas.
You know, the red one with the skeleton on it?
translation.it: Sai quello rosso, con lo scheletro?

translation.en: My brother, Teddy, won't even let me touch his.
translation.it: Teddy non mi fa toccare il suo.
Dice che non è roba per ragazzine.

translation.en: [Kate] I wouldn't waste my time getting him any presents.
translation.it: Io direi di non portargli nulla.

translation.en: He's turning into a real loser-- Ow! Teddy, what the hell?
translation.it: Sta diventando uno sfigato... Teddy, ma che diavolo!

translation.en: -Talking smack about me? -[Kate] Let go! You're gonna break it!
translation.it: - Stavi parlando male di me? - Così la rompi!

translation.en: Who cares? This camera's like 20 years old.
translation.it: Chi se ne importa? Ha 20 anni.

translation.en: If it's good enough for Dad, it's good enough for me. Now, give it back!
translation.it: Era buona per papà, e quindi lo è anche per me. Ridammela!

translation.en: I can't believe you're still making video letters to Santa.
translation.it: Fai ancora le videoletterine per Babbo Natale.
- Hai dieci anni, quasi 11! - E allora?

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, you really have no clue, do you?
chance that he's gonna watch a video.
He only reads handwritten letters sent in the mail.
translation.it: Legge solo le lettere mandate per posta.

translation.en: -[laughs] What? -You can't leave me alone in the house.
translation.it: - Che? - Non puoi lasciarmi da sola a casa!
- I miei pesci! - Spero abbiano fame!

translation.en: Don't worry, guys! Everything's gonna be okay!
-[boy 2] Not too bad, man. -[boy] Let's get outta here.
You have a good time with your friends?
translation.it: Ti sei divertito coi tuoi amici?

translation.en: Get outta my room. You're not allowed in here.
translation.it: Esci dalla mia camera. Non puoi stare qui.

translation.en: And you're not allowed to steal cars from the deli parking lot.
translation.it: E tu non puoi rubare macchine nei parcheggi dei negozi.

translation.en: -I didn't steal a car. -I saw the whole thing.
translation.it: - Non ho rubato un'auto. - Ho visto tutto.

translation.en: When Mom sees this, she's gonna freak out!
translation.it: Quando la vedrà, mamma andrà fuori di testa!

translation.en: She's so sick of your crap, I bet she turns you in to the cops herself!
translation.it: È stufa delle tue ragazzate, ti trasformerà in uno sbirro!

translation.en: Gimme that tape, you little creep!
-[Teddy] Gimme that now! Come on! -No! -Gimme it! -[both grunting]
-Ow! Stop! It's mine! -[Teddy] Come on, stop being such a baby!
translation.it: - Teddy, fermo! È mia! - Piantala di frignare.

translation.en: -[Kate] Stop! -What the hell is going on?
Is this what happens when I leave?
translation.it: Fate così, quando non ci sono?

translation.en: He did something really horrible, and I have proof! [pants]
translation.it: Ha fatto una cosa orribile, ho le prove!

translation.en: He shoved me against the wall, into this picture.
translation.it: Mi ha spinto contro quella foto...

translation.en: [tearfully] You know what I want for Christmas?
translation.it: Sapete cosa voglio io, per Natale?

translation.en: I want for the two of you to get along.
You're her older brother. I expect more from you.
translation.it: Tu sei il più grande! Mi aspetto di più, da te!

translation.en: Teddy, please put the tree back up.
And put the lights on, while you're at it. I've only been asking you all week!
translation.it: E monta le luci, te lo ripeto da una settimana!

translation.en: Come on, you guys! Dad would've had this place looking--
translation.it: Dai, ragazzi! Papà avrebbe reso questo posto...

translation.en: Kate, help me unload the groceries.
[chuckling] This does not look like a Christmas tree. It looks like--
translation.it: Non sembra un albero di Natale, sembra un...

translation.en: Whoa, whoa! You want some cookie with those sprinkles? Golly!
translation.it: Ehi! Piano con quello zucchero! Accidenti!

translation.en: -Thanks. -I think they should all be like that.
[sighs] Isn't there someone else that can...
Yeah, no, of course. I'll-- I'll be right there.
-I don't want to. -[Kate] But it's Christmas Eve!
translation.it: - Non vorrei. - Ma è la vigilia di Natale!

translation.en: Well, even more reason for me to be at the hospital, honey.
translation.it: Motivo in più per essere in ospedale, tesoro.

translation.en: Some people have no one else to take care of them.
translation.it: Alcune di quelle persone sono sole.

translation.en: But there's still so much to do.
We have to hang the stockings and make the eggnog!
translation.it: Dobbiamo attaccare le calze e fare lo zabaione!

translation.en: -It just won't be Christmas without it! -[Mom] Oh, honey.
translation.it: - Non sarà Natale, sennò! - Oh, amore!

translation.en: There is more to Christmas than all that stuff.
translation.it: Natale è ben altro che queste cose!

translation.en: I'm gonna pretend like I didn't hear that, Mom.
translation.it: Farò finta di non aver sentito, mamma.

translation.en: -[Mom] Where? -Me and my friends are going caroling.
translation.it: - Dove? - Canti di Natale con gli amici.

translation.en: You haven't been caroling since you were in kindergarten, and you hated it.
translation.it: Non lo fai dall'asilo, e anche allora lo odiavi.

translation.en: Just wanna spread a little Christmas cheer.
translation.it: Spargo un po' di spirito natalizio.

translation.en: Okay, well, you can't go, 'cause I need to work.
Which is why you're gonna stay home with your sister.
translation.it: Per questo devi restare a casa con tua sorella.

translation.en: You are not to leave this house, young man!
You leave her alone again, and you are grounded!
translation.it: Lasciala di nuovo sola e ti punisco!

translation.en: Take the cookies out in 20 minutes, all right?
translation.it: Sforna i biscotti tra 20 minuti, ok?

translation.en: And don't stay up too late. And no soda! [smooches]
translation.it: Non fare tardi, e niente aranciata!

translation.en: And listen, absolutely no junk food, okay?
translation.it: E assolutamente niente cibo spazzatura, ok?

translation.en: See you guys tomorrow, bright and early.
Wanna watch a movie? Mom's gone, so it can be PG-13 or maybe even R!
translation.it: Vediamo un film? Senza mamma possiamo guardarne uno vietato!

translation.en: -I'm gonna go to my room. -But it's Christmas Eve!
translation.it: - Vado in camera. - Ma è la vigilia di Natale!

translation.en: I told you to stop calling me that.
You used to laugh when I called you Teddy Bear,
and I was your Katie Cat.

translation.it: Ma da quando è morto papà...

translation.en: all you wanna do is hang out with your wannabe gangster friends.
translation.it: Tu vuoi solo stare coi tuoi amici delinquenti.

translation.en: You know... at least they're fun.
translation.it: È perché... con loro mi diverto.

translation.en: They're not boring slugs like you.
-[Dad] Mm, cookies. -[Mom] No! You've had enough, mister!
translation.it: - Biscotti. - No, ne hai avuti abbastanza, caro!

translation.en: [Dad] Is there any chance I can open a Christmas present early?
translation.it: Posso aprire il regalo prima di Natale?

translation.en: [chuckles] No, we have way too much to do.
-[Dad] What is this? What is this? -[Mom] What are you doing?
-I know. -[Dad] I think I like it.
[Mom sighs] Where are you going? Wait. Honey... [Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree O Christmas tree... ♪
translation.it: - Aspetta. Che? Tesoro... - Oh, albero, alberello di Natale...

translation.en: [Mom whispers] You're gonna wake up the kids! -[Mom screams, laughs] -[Dad] ♪ Don't care if the kids wake up ♪
translation.it: - Sveglierai i ragazzi! - ...e non m'importa di svegliarli!

translation.en: [Mom] Seriously? -[Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree ♪ -[Mom] Shh! [Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree ♪
translation.it: - Dai! - Oh, albero, alberello di Natale...

translation.en: -[Dad] ♪ ...up ♪ -[Mom] Seriously? Shh! [Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree O Christmas tree ♪
translation.it: - E dai! - Oh, albero, alberello di Natale...

translation.en: Teddy, get down here! You've gotta see this!
translation.it: Teddy, scendi! Devi vedere una cosa!

translation.en: -[Kate] You know who that looks like. -[Teddy] Aunt Peggy.
translation.it: Lo sai chi è. Zia Peggy.

translation.en: No way. That person isn't wearing an ugly Christmas sweater.
translation.it: Per niente. Mica indossa un orrendo maglione natalizio.
Poi zia Peggy non è mai venuta per la vigilia.

translation.en: Aunt Peggy's never here on Christmas Eve. And if she was,
translation.it: Poi zia Peggy non è mai venuta per la vigilia. E anche se fosse, perché mamma e papà l'avrebbero lasciata

translation.en: why would Mom and Dad leave her alone in the living room
translation.it: E anche se fosse, perché mamma e papà l'avrebbero lasciata

translation.en: would've had to been standing flat up against the wall like this, next to the--
translation.it: si vede che stava radente al muro, vicino al...

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! The fireplace! I just got goosebumps!
translation.it: Oddio! Il camino! Ho la pelle d'oca!

translation.en: -Come on, Teddy. You know it's him. -Kate...
translation.it: - Dai, Teddy, lo sai che è lui. - Kate.

translation.en: Hey, we should make a video!
Tonight! Maybe we can get a shot of the whole Santa Claus, and not just his hand!
translation.it: Stasera! Magari riprendiamo Babbo Natale per intero, non solo la mano!

translation.en: You don't think anyone's thought of that before? Catching Santa in the act?
translation.it: Credi non ci abbiano già pensato? A beccare Babbo Natale?

translation.en: Yeah, but have you ever heard of anyone actually pulling it off?
translation.it: Sì, ma hai mai sentito di qualcuno che ci sia riuscito?

translation.en: No! They probably don't think it's possible. But it is!
translation.it: No! Pensano non sia possibile! Ma lo è!
C'è la prova! Un video che lo mostra!

translation.en: A video showing exactly how he does it. It's gonna get a gazillion hits.
translation.it: C'è la prova! Un video che lo mostra! Lo guarderanno in milioni.

translation.en: Please? Mom always says we should be helping each other out.
translation.it: Ti prego! Mamma dice che dobbiamo aiutarci a vicenda.

translation.en: I don't think this is what she had in mind. Look! I'll give you back the tape of you in the car.
translation.it: - Ma non è questo che intende. - Ti do il video della macchina!

translation.en: And you can never say anything to Mom about it.
translation.it: E a mamma non gliene parlerai mai.

translation.en: I saw it on Ghost Adventurers.
translation.it: L'ho visto in Cacciatori di fantasmi!

translation.en: -Hey! Mom said no junk food! -Yeah, well, we gotta stay up somehow.
translation.it: - Mamma ha detto niente spazzatura! - Dobbiamo restare svegli.

translation.en: sometimes, you gotta break the rules for the greater good.
translation.it: devi infrangere le regole per un bene più grande.

translation.en: Can't even remember the last time we did anything together, Teddy.
translation.it: È tanto che non facciamo qualcosa insieme, Teddy.

translation.en: Just the two of us! Pulling an all-nighter!
translation.it: Solo noi due! Tutta la notte!

translation.en: -[Teddy] What the-- -He's on the roof, let's go!
translation.it: - Ma che... - È sul tetto, andiamo!

translation.en: -He's at the back of the house! -Get your coat!
translation.it: - È sul retro! - Prendi il giubbotto!

translation.en: [Teddy] Did you see that? It's Santa Claus!
We'll get a better view from the alley!
It's more beautiful than I ever imagined. [sighs]
translation.it: È più bello di quanto immaginassi.

translation.en: Do you realize how big of a deal this is? I need to get a closer look.
translation.it: Ma non capisci? Devo vedere più da vicino!

translation.en: -Get down. -No way. Hand me the camera.
Be careful. You break your neck, and Mom will kill me.
translation.it: Attenta! Se ti rompi il collo, mamma mi uccide!

translation.en: Why'd you do that? I wanted to get a closer look at the sleigh.
translation.it: - Perché l'hai fatto? - Volevo vedere la slitta da vicino!

translation.en: -Did he see us? -I don't think so.
We got enough footage. Let's get outta here.
-Why don't we just stay here? -Stay here? In the sleigh?
Yeah! How many kids get to ride with Santa in his sleigh on Christmas Eve?
translation.it: Sì! Quanti possono dire di essere saliti sulla slitta di Babbo Natale?

translation.en: [whispers] Hang in there. He's gonna go back down again.
-Teddy... -I could have swore I saw Paris!
translation.it: - Teddy... - Giurerei di aver visto Parigi!

translation.en: Why? Because I'm not a big fat slob?
translation.it: Perché non sono grasso da far paura?

translation.en: No, no. I-- I didn't mean it that way.
Ah, that's okay, Kate. I guess it's understandable.
I mean, who can eat millions of cookies in one night and not get fat, right?
translation.it: Chi può mangiare milioni di biscotti in una sera senza ingrassare?

translation.en: I don't go, "Ho ho ho." That's a myth.
translation.it: Non faccio "ho, ho, ho". È un mito.

translation.en: You two have really messed things up.
translation.it: Voi due mi avete davvero inguaiato!

translation.en: You were supposed to be asleep.

translation.it: - È stata una sua idea! - Ehi!

translation.en: What did you do with my sack of presents?
We came back over Moscow and...
Reindeer must've broken off somewhere over Lakeshore Drive.
translation.it: Le renne devono essere scappate sopra Lakeshore Drive!

translation.en: That means we traveled thousands of miles in, like, 30 seconds.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto migliaia di km, in, tipo, 30 secondi.
- Da urlo! - Sì, un disastro da urlo.

translation.en: If I'm not up and running in the next couple of hours,
translation.it: Se non riparto entro due ore,

translation.en: half the continent's not gonna get presents, and that, well, that can never happen.
translation.it: metà del continente non riceverà i regali e... beh, non può accadere.

translation.en: Uh, so a few brats don't get presents. It's not the end of the world.
translation.it: Qualche moccioso resterà senza regali, che sarà mai.

translation.en: That's just the kinda lame garbage I'd expect from a Lost Believer.
translation.it: È proprio quel che mi aspetterei di sentire da un ex credente.

translation.en: You listen to me, Teddy Pierce.
young boys and girls all over the globe are waiting, hoping,
translation.it: tutti i bambini del mondo aspettano e sperano
che Babbo Natale arrivi a casa loro.

translation.en: Well, you don't wanna know what happened the last time I couldn't make my rounds.
translation.it: È meglio che non vi dica cos'è accaduto l'ultima volta che non sono passato.

translation.en: You've heard of the Dark Ages?
Read about all those wars in school?
Wait, those happened because you missed Christmas?
translation.it: Sono scoppiate perché non sei passato tu?

translation.en: Christmas spirit is more powerful than you could ever imagine.
translation.it: Lo spirito natalizio è più potente di quel che credi!

translation.en: People need Christmas to remind themselves of how good they can be!
translation.it: Alla gente serve per ricordarsi di quanto si possa essere buoni!

translation.en: Without it, well, Christmas simply... must endure!
translation.it: Senza, beh... semplicemente, Natale deve... sopravvivere!

translation.en: All right, I need to round up the reindeer, find my sack of presents,
translation.it: Ok, devo recuperare le renne e trovare il sacco dei regali,

translation.en: call the elves, and maybe, just maybe, I can still save Christmas. [grunts]
translation.it: chiamare gli elfi e forse, dico forse, alla fine salvare il Natale.

translation.en: The closer you get, the faster it chimes.
translation.it: Più ci si avvicina, più scampanella.

translation.en: At least it's not that far away. [sighs]
Oh no, no, no, no, no, no, no!
Oh, that-- that won't help. Your hat's not magic.
translation.it: Non servirebbe a nulla! Non è magico!

translation.en: Well, how do you think I can turn into coal dust
translation.it: Come pensi che possa trasformarmi in polvere di carbone

translation.en: and leap from rooftop to rooftop?
[sighs] I can't believe this! She told me,
"You should always bring a spare, Nick!"
Well... I guess I'm gonna have to do this the old-fashioned way.
translation.it: Beh, suppongo che si debba fare col vecchio metodo.

translation.en: Santa, just let us help you!
Oh, no, no, no. I think you've done quite enough damage already, don't you?
translation.it: Oh, no! Avete già fatto abbastanza danni, non credete?

translation.en: No, you just go on back to your house and get some sleep.
translation.it: No, tornate a casa a dormire.

translation.en: No need to wake up early.

translation.it: Tanto non ci sarà alcun regalo.

translation.en: [scoffs] You two are on the naughty list for life.
translation.it: Rimarrete nella lista dei cattivi per sempre!

translation.en: We can't just stay here! Santa needs us!
translation.it: Non possiamo rimanere qui, dobbiamo aiutarlo!

translation.en: I don't know. He seems pretty mad.
translation.it: Non lo so. È molto arrabbiato.

translation.en: We're, like, a thousand miles away!
translation.it: Siamo a migliaia di km da casa!

translation.en: Teddy, you heard him. We're on the naughty list for life!
translation.it: Teddy, l'hai sentito! Sulla lista dei cattivi per sempre!

translation.en: I mean, that's, like, the worst possible thing a kid could ever do!
translation.it: È la cosa peggiore che un ragazzo potrebbe fare!

translation.en: Do you really wanna tell your kids that you were that guy?
translation.it: Ai tuoi figli dirai di essere stato tu?

translation.en: The person responsible for the Christmas Meltdown of 2018?
translation.it: Il responsabile per il disastro del Natale 2018?

translation.en: Ah, well, I can't do anything to stop you.
You better watch out, you better not pout, and you better not cry.
translation.it: Ma state attenti. Non tenetemi il muso. E non piangete.

translation.en: I don't have time for any more of your shenanigans.
translation.it: Non ho tempo per i vostri capricci.

translation.en: ♪ Here comes Santa Claus Here comes Santa Claus ♪
Uh, I don't think I'm supposed to be in here.
Just stay next to me, but I'll do the talking.
-How do you know my name? -[chuckles] You got so big!
translation.it: - Come sa il mio nome? - Quanto sei cresciuta!

translation.en: Ah, you know what I mean. Grown-up big!
Now, do you remember that letter you sent me about dreaming of being a fashion designer?
translation.it: Ti ricordi la letterina in cui chiedevi di diventare stilista?

translation.en: She used to always ask for sewing kits, little toy sewing machines.
translation.it: Chiedeva sempre kit da cucito, macchinette da cucire.

translation.en: I think it was 2009 when you made all the stockings by yourself.
translation.it: Penso fosse il 2009, quando hai fatto tutte le calze da sola.

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry the fashion designer thing didn't quite pan out.
translation.it: Mi spiace tu non ce l'abbia fatta.

translation.en: Yeah, I wanted to go to Parsons and live in New York,
translation.it: Volevo andare alla Parsons e vivere a New York, ma...

translation.en: but I couldn't afford the tuition.
Is this some kind of reality show? How do you know all that stuff?
translation.it: Un reality show? Come sa tutte queste cose?

translation.en: Did you talk to my mom?
Oh, no, no, no. I certainly wouldn't ruin the surprise
translation.it: Oh, no. Non vorrei rovinare la sorpresa della bella sciarpa che le hai fatto.

translation.en: of that beautiful scarf you made for your mom.
translation.it: Non vorrei rovinare la sorpresa della bella sciarpa che le hai fatto.

translation.en: -Wendy, we've got a big problem. -[laughs] We need a ride into the city.
translation.it: Wendy, abbiamo un problema. Ci serve un passaggio in città.

translation.en: Oh, I don't have a car. Can you call an Uber?
translation.it: Non ho un'auto. Non potete chiamare un Uber?

translation.en: Oh, you guys got any cash on you?
You think I can pay the driver... with these?
translation.it: Si potrà pagare l'autista con questi?

translation.en: You know what? Um... Here, take my tips.
translation.it: Sapete una cosa? Prendete le mie mance.

translation.en: Um, although I don't think it's enough to cover
-a cab ride-- -That's very kind of you,
but I'm sure somebody in here will help us out.
translation.it: ma forse qui qualcuno ci aiuterà.

translation.en: Uh, sorry for the intrusion, folks.
-The real Santa Claus! -Yeah, that's okay, Kate.
-Not just one of those phony mall ones. -I've got this.
translation.it: - Mica quelli dei centri commerciali. - Faccio io.

translation.en: You don't look like Santa Claus.
Yeah, well, billboards add 80 pounds, Freddie.
translation.it: Sì, beh, i cartelloni ingrassano sempre un po', Freddie.

translation.en: we've got ourselves an emergency situation here.
And if you all want presents under the tree and in your stockings in the morning,
translation.it: Se domattina volete i regali sotto l'albero e nelle calze,

translation.en: who here can give us a ride into the city so I can find my reindeer?
translation.it: chi ci dà un passaggio in città, per recuperare le renne?

translation.en: [in Hindi] You guys have a car you can lend me?

translation.it: La prego, ci lasci in pace.

translation.en: [in English] And I speak English, you moron.
Larry, you drove your Porsche here tonight, didn't you?
translation.it: Larry, sei venuto con la Porsche, giusto?

translation.en: -Yeah. -How would you like to trade that Porsche

translation.it: una figurina in ottimo stato del 1952

translation.en: I know you've always wanted one.
translation.it: Lo so che l'hai sempre desiderata.

translation.en: -It's a deal. It's a deal. -I thought so.
